metadata.title: CVE-2012-5479 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The Portfolio plugin in Moodle 2.1.x before 2.1.9, 2.2.x before 2.2.6, and2.3.x before 2.3.3 allows remote authenticated users to upload and executefiles via a modified Portfolio API callback.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5479` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.2.6.dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.6.dfsg-1').
